title: VOLT: A Provenance-Producing, Transparent SPARQL Proxy for the On-Demand Computation of Linked Data & its Application to Spatiotemporally Dependent Data

author: Blake Regalia, University of California, Santa Barbara

the University of California, Santa Barbara presenting today on our manuscript entitled Vault, A Providence producing transparent Sparkle proxy for the on-demand computation of linked data and its applications to spatiotemporally dependent data.
